definition: Bohai Economic Rim (economic region including Beijing, Tianjin, Hebei, Liaoning and Shandong)
pinyin: Huan2 Bo2 hai3 Wan1 Di4 qu1

definition: ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
same as 渤海[Bo2 Hai3], Bohai Sea between Liaoning and Shandong/Gulf of Zhili or Chihli
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
